item.title: Word Count of SaaS sites
item.description: Being approximately right at the right moment is better than being accurate after the moment has passed. This is a fun weekend project for someone interested in doing a data science project. A problem I’ve been grappling with is what, how, and how much to write on the website of the SaaS product. For a SaaS company, the website is pretty much its salesÂ copy. It is interesting and relevant to know how the market, and especially the competitors, present their sales copy.
